str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To weep, weep for, mourn, lament. Of uncertain affinity; to sob, i.e. Wail aloud.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A primary verb; to be 'cheer'ful, i.e. Calmly happy or well-off; impersonally, especially as salutation, be well.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To buy. From agora; properly, to go to market, i.e. to purchase; specially, to redeem.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From kata and echo; to hold down, in various applications.
